description.narrative: Strategic partnerships are strengthened and social mobilisation intensified at all levels to prevent child marriage and violence against children survey is undertaken, which contributes to Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Harmful Practices (Fgm/C And Child Marriage), Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Child protection policies, legal framework and systems are strengthened to create a co-ordinated multi-sectoral protective environment for all children through social change.

title.narrative: Strategic partnerships are strengthened and social mobilisation intensified at all levels to prevent child marriage and violenceagainst children survey is undertaken

description.narrative: Actions to address child marriage have intensified with major progress in setting up partnerships and mechanisms for implementation of the national strategy but major delays and implementation modality changes have prevented the undertaking of the VAC survey. | Status:Met | As-of Date:19/01/2017

actual.value: 2016:VAC survey implementation was postponed by CDC and probably will take place only in 2018.
